name: Name
headerDescription: Our most significant asset is our strong reputation and the trust of our customers, backed by over 2000 positive reviews.
mainTextDescription:
Your ultimate guide for all about cryptocurrency. We provide seamless and secure ways to buy, sell, and cash your cryptocurrencies with ease. Whether you’re a seasoned crypto enthusiast or just starting to explore the exciting world of digital currencies, our company will provide you with comprehensive information, resources and tools to navigate into the ever-evolving landscape of cryptocurrencies. We prioritize the security of your digital assets above anything else. Our ultra-modern security measures, combined with the best practices of the industry, guarantee a safe and risk-free experience for all our customers.
 Crypto.am - where innovation and financial freedom meet!

faq.title: Is there a minimum money limit for transactions?
faq.description: No minimal money limit exists, while for under $1000 transactions commission fee is $20 (fixed amount).

faq.title: Are crypto transactions reversible?
faq.description: Most crypto transactions are irreversible. Once a transaction is initiated on the blockchain network, it cannot be canceled or reversed. Users should exercise caution when sending cryptocurrencies and ensure they double-check the recipient's address.

faq.title: What is a digital wallet?
faq.description: A digital wallet, also known as a cryptocurrency wallet, is a software application that allows users to store, send, and receive cryptocurrencies securely. It stores the user's private keys, which are essential for accessing and managing their crypto holdings.

faq.title: Is registration required?
faq.description: You don't need to register on our site to make exchanges.

faq2.title: How to buy cryptocurrency?
faq2.description:
1․ Contact us and approach our office․ 
2․ Pay certain amount of money and provide your wallet address․ 
 3․ Get your cryptocurrency after successfully completing the transaction.

faq2.title: How to sell cryptocurrency?
faq2.description:
1․ Contact with us and approach to our office․ 
2․ Transfer your cryptocurrency to the provided wallet address․ 
3․ Get your money after successfully completing the transaction․
